resources.string: This app consists of a set of funny sounds to startle unsuspecting people. Just click on any button to play the corresponding sound. You can play up to 5 sounds at the same time! Have fun!\n\nNote: The sounds are provided by the user \"plagasul\" at http://www.freesound.org/people/plagasul/packs/3/ and are made available via the Creative Commons license.
